content: I know we've seen a lot of crazy things lately, okay? I know you're still trying to put it all together in a way that makes sense. I just want you to understand that what's next is not a prank, okay? I wouldn't do that to you and I'm not doing that to you. So when you see this, you can't yell or make any noise or run anywhere. I know you probably feel like you're being tricked or made fun of. But you're not. I promise you, you're not.
author: Shane Carruth
